entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Apr 19, 19:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 19, 19:27 UTC
Update - We've applied a mitigation and workflows targeting hosted Linux/Windows Larger Runners are running again. There may be some continued delays as queues are processed.

Apr 19, 18:33 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted Linux/Windows Larger Runners, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted.

Apr 19, 18:28 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Issues, Pull Requests and Webhooks
entry.content:
Apr 18, 15:29 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 18, 15:29 UTC
Update - Issues is operating normally.

Apr 18, 15:29 UTC
Update - Webhooks is operating normally.

Apr 18, 15:27 UTC
Update - Actions is operating normally.

Apr 18, 15:12 UTC
Update - We have identified the cause for latency issues affecting Pull Requests and Issues UI experiences and Actions jobs being delayed to process. We have deployed a fix and are monitoring closely.

Apr 18, 14:56 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Apr 18, 14:35 UTC
Update - Issues and Pull Requests are experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Apr 18, 14:35 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Webhooks.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Codespaces and Pages
entry.content:
Mar 29, 19:03 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 29, 18:18 UTC
Update - Codespaces is operating normally.

Mar 29, 18:13 UTC
Update - We are still working towards full recovery. Actions jobs still experience delays when being queued.

Mar 29, 18:10 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Mar 29, 17:41 UTC
Update - We are still working towards full recovery. Actions jobs still experience delays when being queued.

Mar 29, 17:29 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 29, 16:56 UTC
Update - Actions workflows have started running again. We're continuing to work towards full recovery.

Mar 29, 16:47 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 16:22 UTC
Update - We are seeing signs of recovery for Actions and continue to monitor closely. We will continue to post updates about progress as soon as we have them.

Mar 29, 15:42 UTC
Update - We continue to work on mitigating the problems with Actions and Pages with high urgency. We will continue to post updates about our progress.

Mar 29, 15:29 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 29, 14:56 UTC
Update - We are still investigating the cause of Actions degradation, we will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 14:43 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 14:21 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Mar 28, 17:07 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 28, 16:59 UTC
Update - We've applied a mitigation to fix the issues with queuing and running Actions jobs. We are seeing improvements in telemetry and are monitoring for full recovery.

Mar 28, 16:28 UTC
Update - The team continues to investigate issues with some Actions jobs being queued for a long time and a percentage of jobs failing. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Mar 28, 15:45 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Mar 23, 04:55 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 23, 04:51 UTC
Update - We have mitigated the issue and customers should have restored functionality to Codespaces. We are continue to monitor the issue for potential issues before resolving this

Mar 23, 03:51 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.content:
Mar 22, 22:41 UTC

Mar 22, 20:31 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces created in our US West 3 cluster.

Mar 22, 20:23 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Packages and Pages
entry.content:
Mar 15, 15:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 15, 15:21 UTC
Update - Packages is continuing to recover well. Error rates are back to normal and request latency continues to drop. Next update in 10 minutes.

Mar 15, 15:17 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 15:10 UTC
Update - Our mitigation for Packages is progressing well. We are adding capacity back and beginning to see 5xx error rates reduce. Next update in 10 minutes.

Mar 15, 14:52 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:51 UTC
Update - Users of GitHub Package Registry (except Docker and Maven registries) will be experiencing timeout failures. This includes GitHub Actions, Packages API and Packages UI on GitHub.com.

Mar 15, 14:39 UTC
Update - We have identified the source of the issue with GitHub Packages and are working to mitigate the problem.

Mar 15, 14:22 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Mar 15, 14:20 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:09 UTC
Update - Packages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:07 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Pages.

entry.title: Investigating reports of degraded performance.
entry.content:
Mar 3, 21:14 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 3, 17:32 UTC
Update - Due to a GitHub Actions outage yesterday, users may see inconsistent or stale workflow runs while the data is fixed. Customers are not being billed for these runs and new runs are not affected.

Mar 3, 17:32 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.
